name: Seacod 110 Cod Liver Oil Capsules Bottle Of 110
description: Seacod contains pure oil that is taken from the liver of the Atlantic cod species. It is well known that fish are an excellent source of Omega-3 fats and the same is true for a Seacod Capsule. Seacod liver oil also contains Vitamins and nutrients, and its benefits cover a wide range of issues from helping with health conditions to improving brain function.

name: Tedibar Bathing Bar 75gm
description: The Tedibar Baby Soap is a bathing soap that is designed especially for infants and toddlers. What’s unique about this bathing bar is that it is void of any soap and yet helps to effectively cleanse the bodies of infants.

name: Ultra D3 Drops - Vitamin D3 For Infants Vitamin Drops Bottle Of 15 Ml
description: Ultra D3 oral drops provide optimum vitamin D, an essential nutrient for the body. Parents often choose to limit their baby’s sun exposure due to the negative effects of UV rays. These factors may lead to low vitamin D levels. Ultra D3 drops help maintain bone and teeth health.

name: Basic - Freesize Reusable Pocket Cloth Diaper For Babies-with Dry Feel Insert - Swooshes
description: High Quality Waterproof, washable, reusable and one siz cloth diapere: BASIC diapers are waterproof diapers that easily lasts 2-3 hours for an average wetting babies. Adjustable diaper in 4 sizes that can be used for 3 months- 3 years (5 kg- 17 kg) babies/ toddlers Easy to use.

name: Atogla Baby Lotion Bottle Of 200 Ml
description: Atogla Baby Lotion is a baby skin lotion from Atogla designed and formulated especially for child-skin moisturization. With moisture-loss reducing ingredients like Gamma Linolenic Acid, Ceramides, Aloe vera, Wheat Germ Oil, Glycerin, this Atogla lotion provides intense hydration.

name: Groviva Chocolate Child Nutrition Supplement Jar Of 400 G
description: Groviva powder is a scientifically formulated nutritional supplement, in compliance with the Recommended Dietary Allowance (RDA) by the ICMR (2010) guidelines, with 38 key nutrients to support cognitive function, natural immunity, normal growth and development, gut health and bone health in children between 2 and 12 years of age.

name: Vicks Babyrub Soothing Balm Comfort For Babies Bottle Of 25 Ml
description: Vicks babyrub is specially formulated for babies.Contains aloe vera extract, coconut oil and fragrances of lavender, rosemary and eucalyptus.

name: Sebamed Baby Cleansing Bar - 100g
description: Sebamed Baby Cleansing Bar contains Sugar based mild cleanser, Moisture complex of wheat germ oil, inulin, panthenol, lecithin. Sebamed baby bar has pH of 5.5 and sugar based mild cleanser.

name: Aptivate Pineaplle Appetite Stimulating Syrup Bottle Of 175 Ml
description: Aptivate syrup is a pineapple-flavoured syrup that helps in boosting appetite naturally. This pineapple tasting syrup is ideal for fussy eaters in our houses who don't have a good appetite. It is made up of natural elements, thus ensuring the safety and purity of your and your loved one's health.

name: Atogla Baby Cream Tube Of 100 G
description: Designed and formulated especially for sensitive baby skin, Atogla Baby Cream reduces moisture loss and helps to prevent dryness. Atogla Baby Cream helps in treating rashes and dry skin. The nourishing cream has soothing ingredients like Aloe Vera and Ceramide.

name: Spoo Shampoo Bottle Of 125 Ml
description: Spoo is gentle, mild, tear free and sulphate free shampoo specially formulated for everyday shampooing of your babyÂ’s fine and delicate hair. Spoo has ingredients that are extremely mild but very efficient in cleansing and moisturizing the hair and scalp

name: Himalaya Baby Powder Bottle Of 400 G
description: Himalaya Baby Powder is infused with the power of herbs to leave your baby smelling fresh and clean while preventing rashes and infections. Himalaya Baby Powder eliminates dryness and keeps your baby cool during hot summers.

name: Sebamed Baby Gentle Wash - 400ml
description: Sebamed baby wash is an extra soft liquid cleanser with a gentle emollient formula that moisturises the delicate skin of babies. Its naturally moisturising ingredients such as Allantoin and Squalane also soothes and softens the skin of your baby.

name: Himalaya Baby Wipes Packet Of 72 's
description: Himalaya Baby Wipes pack of 72 wipes is an essential tool that should be a part of your baby care kit. These moisturizing Himalaya Baby Wipes help to clean your baby without using any alcohol or chemicals, leaving your baby’s skin soft, safe and clean.

name: Aptamil Stage 1 Infant Formula Baby Food Tin Of 400 G
description: The Aptamil Stage 1 infant formula is an amazing substitute for mother’s milk when it is either not available or available in inadequate quantity. This excellent baby weaning formula is created from 40 years of research with 30 cynical studies on breast milk conducted by Spain’s Danone Nutricia.

name: Johnson's No More Tears Baby Shampoo Bottle Of 200 Ml
description: A baby's physique is extremely delicate and sensitive. Johnson's No More Tears Baby Shampoo is the perfect formulation to gently cleanse a baby's scalp and hair and the foam doesn't irritate the eyes. It leaves the hair soft, shiny and fresh without causing any stinging sensations.

name: Similac Iq+ Baby Food Stage 1 Infant Formula Dha + Natural Vitamin E Up To 6 Months Tin Of 400 G
description: The Similac Stage 2 baby formula is the nutritional diet for infants after the age of 6 months. It is a follow-up feeding formula that is used after the Similar Stage 1 baby formula.

name: Johnson's Baby Cotton Buds 75 Pieces
description: Johnson's baby cotton ear buds for babies.

name: Johnson's Baby Soap - 150g
description: Johnson’s Baby Soap is an advanced milk solution made especially for babies. A baby’s skin consists of a layer of moisturising oil that keeps their body soft. If the baby’s skin texture is not maintained, it results in the baby’s dried skin and causes rashes.

name: Similac Isomil Soy Baby Food Lactose Free (upto 24 Months) Tin Of 400 G
description: Similac Isomil is a soy-based, milk-free, lactose-free, low osmolality infant formula, specially created to meet the nutritional needs of infants suffering from lactose intolerance or sensitivity, milk allergy, management of diarrhoea and galactosemia.

name: Dexolac Baby Food Stage 1 Infant Formula (upto 6 Months) Box Of 400 G
description: Dexolac Stage 1 is a spray-dried infant formula designed for infants up to 6 months that can be used as a milk substitute under medical supervision. Dexolac Stage 1 contains 36 essential nutrients that support all facets of growth and development from bone and muscle growth to brain development and immunity resilience.

name: Farex Gentle Baby Food Stage 1 Infant Formula Refill Of 400 G
description: Danone is a global food company designed to provide the best nutrition at each stage of life. Farex Gentle Stage 1 Formula is a powdered infant milk substitute.

name: Nestle Pre Nan Baby Food Low Birth Weight Infant Milk Formula Tin Of 400 G
description: Mother's milk is unarguably the best source of nutrition for the infant. Infant milk substitutes, such as the Nestle Pre NAN Powder, can be given in conjunction with the mother's milk. Nestle Pre NAN Powder, in the net quantity of 400gms, is specially formulated for premature babies who are born weighing less than 2.5kgs. This powder contains Vitamins and Maltodextrins that help in the healthy growth of the baby. It contains nucleotides and LC-PUFAs as well, which make this a nutrient-rich diet.

description: Pampers Diapers for babies

name: Cetaphil Baby Massage Oil - 200ml
description: Triple blend of Sunflower oil, Soybean oil and Shea Butter, this oil gently moisturises and protects your baby's delicate skin!

name: Mothercare All We Know Baby Oil - 300ml
description: Mothercare All We Know Baby Oil is a revitalising baby oil that is gentle on the tender skin of babies. It is a dermatologically tested hypoallergenic oil that nourishes the skin of newborns. This oil can be used to massage babies to keep their skin moisturised at all times.

name: Baby Dove Rich Moisture Baby Massage Oil - 100 Ml
description: Baby Dove Rich Moisture Baby Massage Oil is specially designed to lock in moisture, soothe dry baby skin and is a pleasure to use. Its light, non-greasy and fast-absorbing formula keeps the baby's skin feeling soft and moisturized all day long.

name: B4 Nappi Baby Rash Cream Tube Of 75 G
description: The B4 Nappi Cream works wonders when treating irritating rashes in babies due to continuous diaper wear. Rashes can be extremely itchy and uncomfortable and can make your child cranky and fussy all day.

name: Depura Kids 400 Vit D Nano Vitamin Drops Bottle Of 15 Ml

name: Fast&up Charge Kids With Active Vitamin C Complex, Super Immunity Herbs And Pro Immunity Vitamins & Minerals - Mango Flavour
description: Fast&Up Charge Kids with Active Vitamin C Complex, Super Immunity Herbs and Pro Immunity Vitamins & Minerals helps in increasing iron absorption and assists formation of collagen in the body.

name: Green Cure Natural Baby Oil For Healthy Bones & Muscles, Enriched With Almond Oil, Squalan And 30 Natural Oils - 200ml
description: GERMAN ENGINEERING MEETS INDIAN AYURVEDA - Prepared with 100% herbal goodness with no chemical actives, Designed by German Scientists in collaboration with Ayurveda Doctors DEEPLY NOURISHES AND SOFTENS - Enriched with Almond Oil, Squalan and 30 other carefully selected oils, it goes deep into the babys skin making it soft, supple and moisturised.

name: Palmers Baby Oil - 150ml
description: Palmer's Cocoa Butter Formula Baby Oil is a moisturising baby oil specially formulated for baby's dry skin. A unique blend of Pure Cocoa Butter, Vitamin E and other natural oils helps deliver powerful benefits to lil ones' delicate skin. This hypoallergenic baby oil softens and protects and is gentle enough for daily use.

name: Chicco Baby Moments Soap 125 Gm
description: Chicco Baby Moments Soap, with its hydrating and moisturising formula, nourishes the baby's bath so that the baby's skin stays soft all day long. The ingredients of Chicco Baby Moments Soap are purely natural, like Aloe vera, Glycerine and Olive fruit oil, which keeps the baby’s skin hydrated and highly moisturised to prevent scaly patches and dryness.

name: Mee Mee Fresh Feel Baby Powder - 500 G
description: Mee Mee Fresh Feel Baby Powder is clinically tested and gentle for your baby's tender skin. Climate changes and Ther factors can leave your baby feeling uncomfortable. This lightweight powder will help keep your baby's skin fresh and dry. It is safe to use from birth and is dermatologically tested.

name: Johnson's Baby Soap Blossoms 75grams
description: Johnson's Baby Soap for healthy bath of your baby.

name: Johnson's Baby Milk Soap 75gm
description: Infused with the power of milk protein, Johnson’s Baby Milk Soap is designed especially for sensitive baby skin. Johnson’s Baby Milk Soap composition and ingredients are formulated to be mild but protective to ensure clean and safe washing for delicate baby skin.

name: Aveeno Baby Wash Daily Moisturizing Bath Bottle Of 354 Ml
description: Aveeno Baby Wash Daily Moisturizing Bath is exclusively for the cute and lovely babies out there. It contains natural oat extracts that are highly beneficial for soft baby skin. It perfectly blends natural oat extract into a rich lathering cleansing wash favourable for infants and babies.

name: Himalaya Gentle Baby Wash Bottle Of 400 Ml
description: It is important to maintain your newborn/baby's hygiene and at the same time ensure that the product you are using is safe for your little one. Himalaya Gentle Baby Wash, from your trusted Himalaya brand, gives you just that. With its unique No Tears formula, Himalaya Gentle Baby Wash is infused with the goodness of Chickpea, Fenugreek and Green Gram which cleanses your newborn’s skin gently.

name: Sebamed Baby Wash Extra Soft - 50ml
description: An ultra mild wash active compound for the gentle daily cleansing of baby's delicate skin. Skin related squalane balances the skin's lipid content protecting against dryness and irritation. The pH value of 5.5 is the natural pH skin's acid mantle, which protects the health of baby's skin which is still in the process of developing.

name: Mustela Gentle Cleansing Gel - 500ml
description: Cleansing Gel for babies.

Moreover, its no tears formula enriched with pot marigold and glycerin has moisturising properties for a baby's delicate skin.

name: Johnson's Baby Top To Toe Bath Wash - 500ml
description: For delicate skin and sensitive eyes. It is a safe baby wash product.

name: Green Cure Natural Baby Bath Soothing & Gentle For Sensitive Baby Skin - 200ml
description: Green Cure Natural Baby Bath is a carefully designed non-toxic formula. The formulation is designed in Germany with the help of trained Ayurvedic professionals. Green Cure Natural Baby Bath uses 100 per cent natural ingredients like almond oil and magnolia bark that will not cause any irritation to the gentle skin and eyes of your baby.

name: The Moms Co. Natural Baby Bath Kit Of 600 Ml
description: The Moms Co. Natural Baby Bath Kit is the ultimate package of goodness for your little one. This baby bath kit consists of a Natural Baby Wash, a Natural Baby Massage Oil, a Natural Baby Shampoo and a Natural Diaper Rash Cream from The Moms Co. baby care range.

name: Chicco Baby First Cuddle Gift Set -pink
description: Chicco Baby Moments Gift Pack is a complete skin care range to cleanse and moisturize your baby's delicate and tender skin. All the products are characterized by safe formulations and are suitable for baby's skin from the very first day.

name: Little's Soft Cleansing Baby Wipes With Aloe Vera Jojoba Oil And Vitamin E - 30 Wipes
description: Little’s Soft Cleansing Baby Wipes are perfect for keeping your baby’s skin clean from dirt and germs while also moisturising it. Little’s Cleansing Wipes contain no alcohol since alcohol can lead to the skin drying quicker.

name: Tiffy & Toffee 99% Water Baby Wet Wipes 80 Pcs - Single Pack
description: The Baby Wet Wipes with lid designed by Tiffy & Toffee takes into account every minute details for your new-born's gentle skin and their easiness. This antifungal baby wipe has been specially made keeping in mind the sensitive skin of the child

name: Beebaby Fresh Aloe Vera Baby Wet Wipes With Lid - 1 Pack Of 72 Pieces Each, White
description: Infused with the goodness of aloe vera and vitamin e, the Supples baby wipes are a handy way to keep your baby's delicate skin refreshed and clean. The BeeBaby Fresh baby wet wipes are 100 percent free from alcohol, parabens, soap, chlorine and other toxic elements and thus, entirely safe for everyday use. Take it anywhere you go with your baby and protect your little one from skin infections.

name: Wipeout Baby Safety Wipes Pack Of 80 Wipes
description: WIPEOUT BABY SAFETY WIPES PACK OF 80 WIPES is a germ-killing machine. The wipes are ideal for sanitizing, cleansing and moisturizing the baby's skin.

name: Mothercare All We Know Non Fragranced Baby Wipes - 60 Wipes
description: Mothercare All We Know Non-Fragranced Baby Wipes with baby lotion are strong yet soft on delicate skin. Natural extracts of chamomile and aloe vera help protect against causes of nappy rash for a gentle, soft clean.

name: Instant Hand Cleanser ( Alcohol Based And Organic)- 100ml
description: With infections leading to diseases on the rise, it is our hands that transfer most of the germs by touching various viruses and microbes daily, though unintentionally.In this situation where nothing else really helps, Alconanz hand cleanser can give you that protection and safety to ensure upto 99.9% Germ Protection.

name: Savlon Surface Disinfectant Spray 170g
description: The dirt and germs on surfaces can easily be cleaned to give access to a hygienic environment with Savlon Surface Disinfectant Spray. Savlon disinfectant can be used on various surfaces including tabletops, chairs, doorknobs, flooring and even curtains.

name: Accu-chek Active Glucometer Test Strips Box Of 50
description: Accu-Chek Active Strip helps in determining the blood sugar level in the body. It does not require any manual coding and allows hassle free usage. The sugar test strips absorb the blood easily and spreads quickly on the strip.

name: Dr Morepen Gluco One Bg 03 Glucometer Test Strips Box Of 50
description: This blood glucose electronic testing machine from Dr Morepen is to be used with the BG-03 strips and gives a reading of blood glucose level at the time of testing.

name: 3 Ply Mask Packet Of 100
description: As the pandemic takes a toll on our lifestyle, 3 ply masks have become an everyday essential. There are several types of masks available in the market but these are the most effective and offer you three-layered protection.

name: Dettol Antiseptic Liquid Bottle Of 125 Ml
description: Dettol Antiseptic Liquid is widely used to prevent infections caused due to bacteria, fungus and viruses. As a first-aid, Dettol is used for cleaning wounds and scrapes, preventing the risk of any infections. It is dermatologically tested and recommended by the Indian Medical Association for surface cleaning and as a personal hygiene liquid.

name: Liveasy Wellness Calcium, Magnesium, Vitamin D3 & Zinc - Bones & Dental Health - Bottle Of 60 Tablets
description: LivEasy Wellness Calcium D3 Capsules contain calcium, vitamin D3, magnesium and zinc which are crucial for strong bones, joints, muscles & teeth. It supports bones formation, repair and healing. Vitamin D3 improves calcium absorption, thus supports healthy bones and joints.

name: Everherb Ashwagandha - Immunity Booster Capsules - Anxiety & Stress Relief - Bottle Of 60
description: EverHerb Ashwagandha is an ayurvedic formula which contains Ashwagandha extract from roots of the Ashwagandha plant. One of the most revered herbs in Ayurveda, Ashwagandha helps the body resist physiological and psychological stress by enabling it to reserve and sustain vital energy all through the day and promoting a sound sleep during the night.

name: Everherb Giloy (guduchi) 500mg - Ayush Recommended Immunity Booster - Maintains Resipiratory Health - Bottle Of 60
description: EverHerb Giloy Capsules are empowered with the numerous health benefits of the Ayurvedic wonder-herb Giloy, also known as Tinospora cordifolia. This herb is a powerhouse of antioxidants that are plant compounds and can fight off free radicals and prevent oxidative damage to cells. Giloy also has anti-allergic, anti-viral, antibacterial properties and helps in controlling cold, cough and similar allergies. It helps in maintaining respiratory health.

name: Medlife Advanced Hand Sanitizer 200 Ml
description: Medlife Advanced Hand Sanitizer has been clinically proven to be able to wipe out 99.9% of germs in just 3 to 4 seconds. It is fit to be used frequently and thoroughly without any side effects on the skin.

name: Samrvir Forest Herbs Hand Sanitizer 50 Ml
description: Hand Sanitizer that protects from 99.99% germs.

name: Dettol Instant Original Hand Sanitizer Bottle Of 200 Ml
description: Dettol Hand Sanitizer is the most trusted brand for personal hygiene and safety that is recommended by the Indian Medical Association. It offers instant sanitisation of your hands without water, whether you are in public or in the security of your home.

name: Bajaj Nomarks Hand Sanitizer - 500ml
description: Bajaj Hand Sanitizers clinically tested and verified to protect from germs and bacteria.

name: Dettol Surface Disinfectant Spray Sanitizer For Germ-protection On Hard & Soft Surfaces, Spring Blossom- 225ml
description: Dettol Disinfectant spray sanitizer is an alcohol-based multi-purpose spray that can be used to eliminate harmful bacteria or viruses from various surfaces. Dettol Disinfectant spray sanitizer is very effective in killing a majority of viruses from different surfaces, making it a handy sanitizer.

name: Lifebuoy Antibacterial Germ Kill Spray (no Gas) Safe On Skin, Safe On Surfaces - 85 Ml
description: Lifebuoy Antibacterial Germ Kill Spray kills 99.9% of disease-causing germs with just one spray. It is proven to sanitise any kind of surface and is safe on the skin. The germ kill spray is convenient to carry anywhere and should be used to combat coronavirus in public places.

name: Cipla Ciphands Daily Surface Disinfectant Spray - 75 Ml
description: CIPHANDS DAILY DISINFECTANT SANITIZER SPRAY

name: Tri-activ Instant Hand Sanitizer (500ml) With Pump
description: Tri-Activ Instant Hand Sanitizer is a disinfectant hand sanitizer gel that kills 99.9% of illness causing germs instantly, leaving hands clean and bacteria free. It provides triple protection against virus, bacteria and germs.

name: Dr Rhazes 7 Day Surface Disinfectant Shield Spray (250 Ml) Trigger Spray
description: Spray germs away with ZM Labs Hand Sanitizer Spray. ZM labs Hand sanitizer Spray kills 99.9% viruses and bacteria instantly and without water. This alcohol-based formulation helps protect you and your family from illness causing germs.

name: Tri-activ Disinfectant Spray For Multi-surfaces - 70% Alcohol Based - 230ml
description: Tri-Activ disinfectant is a spray that is effective against the triple threat of bacteria, viruses and germs. Since viruses can survive between 3 hours to 7 days on surfaces, Tri-Activ can be used effectively to disinfect both hard and soft surfaces.

name: Nukind Giloy Immunity Booster Capsule 10
description: Giloy Capsule to boost your immunity.

name: Godrej Protekt Disinfectant Spray - Air & Surface Sanitizer - Aqua Fragrance - 240ml
description: Godrej Protekt Disinfectant Air and Surface Spray kills 99.9% germs and bacteria around your home. It also kills cold and flu viruses keeping you and your loved ones safe.

name: Pure Nutrition Ashwagandha Ksm-66 Supports Muscle Strength And Heart Health- 60 Veg Capsules

name: Biogetica Reginmune Immune Support - 30 Capsules
description: Reginmmune is a bioregulator that improves the nutritional and energy state of the body. It potentially boosts immunity. The mechanism of action is believed to: Maintain the natural mechanisms that influence the processes of natural immuno regulation; it energizes the natural mechanisms involved in restoring homeostasis.

name: Everherb Amla - Immunity Booster Capsules - Natural Vitamin C - Bottle Of 60
description: EverHerb Amla Capsules contain extracts from fruits of Emblica Officinalis or Amla, also known as Indian gooseberries. Amla is a powerful superfruit loaded with vitamin C, Vitamin B complex and many essential minerals like iron, calcium, fibres, etc. It is an excellent antioxidant, immunomodulator, rejuvenator and immunity booster.

name: Dr. Vaidyas Imunoherb | Immunity Boosting Capsules | 30 Capsules Each (pack Of 3)
description: Dr. Vaidya’s Imunoherb Capsule is an Ayurvedic immunity capsule to support healthy immune function. This immunity booster capsule has been specifically designed to boost immunity power and increase resistance to viral infections with a blend of immunomodulatory herbs like amla, giloy, and neem. These herbs are natural immune boosters that can help build resistance to viral infections.

name: Luxor Nano Pen Sanitizer Spray Twin Pack , Classic- 10ml X2
description: Luxor Nano ethanol based pen spray hand sanitizer provides Instant On-The-Go Superior protection for your hands by killing 99.99% germs and viruses. 10 ml Pen sprayer which gives upto 100 sprays .

name: Rxsafe Utensitize: Expert Sanitizer For Utensils And Kitchenware |goodness Of Tulsi| Kills Up To 99.99% Germs, Viruses And Bacteria |500 Ml

It is enriched with the goodness of Tulsi and is suitable for glass, porcelain, and metal surfaces.

name: Emami Emasol Disinfectant Floor Cleaner Citrus - 975 Ml

name: Lizol Power All Purpose Disinfectant Liquid Bottle Of 450 Ml
description: Lizol All-Purpose Disinfectant Cleaner is designed to achieve fresh, germ-free and healthy surfaces. With every use, it kills 99.9% of germs that ensures a healthy living environment. The Disinfectant by Lizol removes dirt marks and cuts through grease, giving you a fresher and healthy home to live in.

name: Anchor Pilot Surface Cleaner (rose) - 500ml
description: Disinfectant Surface Cleaner helps to create a world that is protected from illness-causing germs, with one mission in mind – ‘Breaking the chain of infection’. Cleanse & disinfect** every corner of the house with Lizol, make it safe to touch so that one's loved ones are always protected. Lizol is tested effective against COVID-19 Virus* proven.

name: Godrej Aer Travel Sanitizer, Aqua, Anti - Bacterial, 99.9% Germ Protection - 85ml
description: With Godrej aer Travel Sanitizer, travel safely by just spraying it on surfaces like car door handle, steering wheel, windows, seats, armrests and inside of helmet.

description: Dr Cleanup's Floor Cleaner is specially formulated ingredients in one form to clean hard-surface, disinfect the floor and to remove dirt, dust, stains, bad smells, and clutter on surfaces. It helps clean yhe surface, removing bad odor.

name: Liveasy Essentials All In One Vaporizer
description: LivEasy Essentials All In One Vaporizer is made up of good quality copper wire to generate dense steam and contains 3 attachments that can be used for multiple purposes. This device can help relieve the symptoms of a common cold or the flu. It can decongest the lungs, clear away the sinuses, and aid in easier breathing and better sleep.

name: Tri-activ N95 Masks With 6 Layer Protection Anti-virus Coating 99.5% Filtration Efficiency
description: The N95 pollution mask is equipped with 6 layer protection. The first layer has a virucidal coat, which is splash resistant and prevents droplet transmission. The 2nd layer is a protective spunbond layer that filters coarse particles. The 3rd and 4th layer have meltblown fabric filters that keep dust and pollution out. The 5th layer is a protective spunbond layer that filters microparticles and the 6th and final layer is soft and breathable ensuring comfort in all weather conditions. The mask conforms to NIOSH standards and is quite safe and long-lasting.

name: Dettol Lime Fresh Disinfectant Liquid Bottle Of 1 L
description: Dettol Disinfectant Liquid comes with a fresh and pleasing Lime Fresh fragrance. This multipurpose disinfectant liquid can be used in a variety of ways to maintain your home and personal hygiene. With proper usage, Dettol Disinfectant protects against 100 disease-causing germs.

name: Dr Trust Usa Waterproof Flexible Tip Digital Thermometer - 1pc
description: Dr trust digital thermometer provides a quick and highly accurate reading of a person’s body temperature. It is intended to measure the human body’s temperature in regular mode either orally or under the arm. The device is reusable for clinical or home use on people of all ages.

name: Dr Odin Digital Thermometer
description: The Dr Odin thermometer is an accurate, reliable and fast thermometer to check body temperature in kids, adults and animals. This thermometer from Dr Odin can be used orally, rectally and under the arms to get a high accuracy temperature reading in either Fahrenheit or Celsius.

name: Omron Digital Mc 246 Thermometer 1
description: Digital Thermometer

name: Prozo Plus Digital Waterproof Thermometer
description: PROZO PLUS DIGITAL WATERPROOF THERMOMETER provides a quick and highly accurate reading of an individual's body temperature. The digital thermometer is intended to measure the human body temperature orally, rectally, or by placing it in the underarm region.

name: Beurer Ft 09/1 Clinical Thermometer
description: Fever measurement made easy! The clinical thermometer with contact-measurement technology is easy to use and waterproof.

name: Topnotch Digital Thermometer
description: The Topnotch digital thermometer is an efficient device to measure body temperature to determine a fever. The thermometer is fast and easy to use. Just place it in your mouth, under the tongue and wait for a reading. You can also place the thermometer under your armpit.

name: Control D Thermometer
description: Control D thermometers are essential in every household. It helps you measure body temperature. Digital thermometers are fast, accurate and easy to use. It gives a temperature reading in a few seconds. It has a rigid tip, is water-resistant and also has a fever alarm.

name: Dr Morepen Gluco One Bg 03 Glucometer Test Strips Box Of 50
description: This blood glucose electronic testing machine from Dr Morepen is to be used with the BG-03 strips and gives a reading of blood glucose level at the time of testing.

name: Intex Oxicare Pulse Oximeter
description: Digital Oximeter to check oxygen levels

name: Oxysat - Finger Tip Pulse Oximeter With 2 Batteries, 18 Months Warranty
description: The OxySat fingertip pulse Oximeter is a small portable and easy-to-use oximeter for checking your blood oxygen levels as well as your pulse rate. With a bright OLED panel display, readings are easy to see, with clear and simple information provided on each reading.

name: Control D Pulse Oximeter
description: Control D Pulse Oximeter is a highly accurate device to check Pulse and SpO2 blood oxygen saturation levels. Measuring oxygen saturation is very important. It is as important as measuring pulse rate and hence pulse oximeter is a valuable piece of equipment that can help decide oxygen flow.

name: Dr Odin Finger Tip Pulse Oximeter
description: The Dr Odin Pulse Oximeter is a quick device to measure the oxygen saturation levels of your blood. This instrument involves a non-invasive procedure that accurately measures what percentage of oxygen is being carried by your blood to all the parts of your body.

name: Bpl Smart Oxy Finger Tip Pulse Black Oximeter (black)
description: The BPL Pulse Oximeter is used to measure your pulse rate and oxygen levels in the blood, and it comes in a small, easy-to-use form. Pulse oximeters are used in many medical cases mostly relating to lungs and breathing issues, for example during or after surgery, to check how the lung treatments are progressing, to monitor the body's ability to handle physical activity, to determine whether a person requires a ventilator if their lungs aren’t providing enough oxygen and many other similar situations.

name: Naulakha Curomed Fingertip Pulse Oximeter ( Yk-80b )
description: Digital Fingertip Pulse Oximeter

name: Prozo Plus Vaporizer- Steam Inhaler (premium Quality)

It helps to deal with throat irritation and clearing out the nasal passage. The Prozo Plus Vaporizer can also be used in daily skincare by opening up and helping to clear out skin pores.

name: Easycare Compressor Nebulizer Perfect For All Ages Along With Air Flow Controller (certified By Ce, Iso) Handle To Carry Easy

name: Dr Trust Bestest Compressor Nebulizer Machine Kit
description: The Dr Trust Bestest compressor nebulizer is a complete solution for people suffering from either acute or chronic respiratory disorders like asthma. It is designed to incorporate the revolutionary RespiRight technology that is unique to all Dr Trust nebulizers.

name: Bpl Breath Ezee N10 Nebulizer & Vapourizer
description: Using the latest, 4th generation mesh technology, the BPL N10 Breath Ezee Nebulizer comes with rechargeable batteries and a small, portable design. The BPL N10 nebulizer features a simple, one-button operation and features a mask that can be used by kids and adults.
